content: Question: What is a SITizen? Answer: The day you join SIT as a learner, you become a SITizen. And we have a saying: Once a SITizen, always a SITizen. We believe that learning is for life. Even after you graduate, you will be a SITizen for life.

Question: What is unique about SIT? Answer: As Singapore's first university of applied learning, we develop individuals and innovate with industry to impact the economy and society in meaningful ways. And we do this through our unique applied learning pedagogy. Read more about our latest successes and happenings on our [newsroom](https://www.singaporetech.edu.sg/news) and learn more about the SIT experience on the [Why SIT page](https://www.singaporetech.edu.sg/why-sit).
